620970.name: Fantasy Grounds - White Dragons (Token Pack)
620970.description:
White Dragons

A Graemation Token pack of hand drawn digital character tokens, made for adventures set around White Dragons, their humanoid species.
Add some flavour to your Encounters, NPCs or to be used as Characters with these 18 White Dragon tokens. These Tokens include a White Dragon, a variety armouWhite Dragon humanoids covering all the core fantasy armours, and even some dragon eggs.
Included in this Token Pack:
  • White-Bandedmail-Dragonborn
  • White-Barbarian-Dragonborn
  • White--Bard-Dragonborn
  • White-Breast-Plate-Dragonborn
  • White-Chainmail-Dragonborn
  • White--Chain-Shirt-Dragonborn
  • White-Druid-Dragonborn
  • White-Eggs
  • White-Egg-Shell
  • White-Hide-Dragonborn
  • White-Leather-Dragonborn
  • White-Monk-Dragonborn
  • White-Platemail-Dragonborn
  • White-Scalemail-Dragonborn
  • White-Splintmail-Dragonborn
  • White-Studded-Leather-Dragonborn
  • White-Wizard-Dragonborn
  • Dragon-White
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
